name: lankly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of hair) in a way that is not attractive because of being completely straight and thin: His dark brown hair fell lankly over his forehead. In his shabby cardigan, his hair lankly covering his collar, he could be a poet. See
lank
More examplesFewer examplesHer dark brown hair hangs lankly below her ears. A succession of gangly boys walked past, hair lankly flapping over their eyes. Under the long dark hair hanging lankly over the driver's neck, David noticed a big red spot.
